title: Noah's Ark - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 11/25/20
itunes:title: Noah's Ark - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 11/25/20
description:
George Noory and archeologist Dr. Aaron Judkins explore his expedition to Mt. Ararat in Turkey to find evidence of Noah's Ark, the boat that saved animals and humans from the worldwide flood in the Bible that wiped out all life on Earth.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

itunes:summary: A discussion on the search for the remains of the ship from the Biblical flood.
